EmailTemplate.description: Notifies training assistants and training team leads when onsite trainer PTO is approved
EmailTemplate.name: Time Off Approved - Trainer
EmailTemplate.subject: Time off has been approved for {!SFDC_Paid_Time_Off__c.Employee_s_Name__c} starting {!SFDC_Paid_Time_Off__c.From_Date__c} for {!SFDC_Paid_Time_Off__c.Total_Days_Requested__c} days
